Field.Description: Enable MAC transmit datapath and flowcontrol logic
Field.Name: TX_EN

Field.Description: Enable MAC receive datapath and flowcontrol logic.
Field.Name: RX_EN

Field.Description: Enables local loopback from TX to RX
Field.Name: LOCAL_LPBK

Field.Description: If set, Tiny MAC will move from lag failover state to normal operation.
Field.Name: REMOVE_FAILOVER_LPBK

Field.Description: If set, enable LAG Failover.
Field.Name: LAG_FAILOVER_EN

Field.Description: If set, disables the corresponding port logic and status registers only.
Field.Name: SOFT_RESET

Field.Description: If set, during the local loopback mode, the transmit packets are also sent to the transmit line interface, apart from the loopback operation
Field.Name: LOCAL_LPBK_LEAK_ENB

Field.Description: Resets the RS layer functionality
Field.Name: RS_SOFT_RESET

Field.Description: Link status indication from Software.
Field.Name: SW_LINK_STATUS

Field.Description: This configuration chooses between link status indication from software (SW_LINK_STATUS) or the hardware link status (hw_link_status)indication from the TSC
Field.Name: LINK_STATUS_SELECT

Field.Description: When set, if link-down occurs, the receive MAC will terminate the current packet-in-progress and not relay any subsequent packets to the system and the transmit MAC will read packets from the MAC FIFO and drop them internally.
Field.Name: MAC_LINK_DOWN_SEQ_EN

Field.Description: CRC mode for transmit side
Field.Name: CRC_MODE

Field.Description: If set, MAC accepts packets from the EP and discards them on the line side.
Field.Name: DISCARD_EN

Field.Description: When set, MAC enables the CRC corruption on the transmitted packets
Field.Name: TX_CRC_CORRUPT_EN

Field.Description: If set, enable CDMAC to pad packets smaller than PAD_THRESHOLD on the Tx.
Field.Name: PAD_EN

Field.Description: If padding is enabled, packets smaller than PAD_THRESHOLD are padded to this size.
Field.Name: PAD_THRESHOLD

Field.Description: Average Inter Packet Gap.
Field.Name: AVERAGE_IPG

Field.Description: If set, the Deficit Idle Count is capped to zero; it is not allowed to increment beyond zero.
Field.Name: CAP_DIC_TO_0

Field.Description: Indicates the number of 48-byte cells that are buffered per packet in the Tx CDC FIFO, before starting transmission of the packet on the line side.
Field.Name: TX_THRESHOLD

Field.Description: When asserted, if the MAC Tx is in the middle of transmitting a packet, it waits for the next packet boundary to stop transmitting any more packets.
Field.Name: STALL_TX

AppDB.Name: TINY_MAC_RX_MAX_SIZE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Tiny MAC Rx Max packet size

Field.Description: Maximum packet size in receive direction, exclusive of preamble and CRC in strip mode.
Field.Name: RX_MAX_SIZE

Field.Description: This bit determines the transmit response during local fault state.
Field.Name: LOCAL_FAULT_DISABLE

Field.Description: This bit determines the transmit response during remote fault state.
Field.Name: REMOTE_FAULT_DISABLE

Field.Description: This bit determines the transmit response during link interruption state.
Field.Name: LINK_INTERRUPTION_DISABLE

Field.Description: This bit determines the way MAC handles data during local fault state
Field.Name: DROP_TX_DATA_ON_LOCAL_FAULT

Field.Description: This bit determines the way MAC handles data during remote fault state.
Field.Name: DROP_TX_DATA_ON_REMOTE_FAULT

Field.Description: This bit determines the way MAC handles data during link interruption state.
Field.Name: DROP_TX_DATA_ON_LINK_INTERRUPT

Field.Description: If set, the receive pause and PFC timers are reset whenever the link status is down, or local or remote faults are received.
Field.Name: RESET_FLOW_CONTROL_TIMERS_ON_LINK_DOWN

Field.Description: If set, and if the FAULT_SOURCE_FOR_TX = SW_CNFG_REG, LOCAL_FAULT ordered-sets are sent in the Tx direction.
Field.Name: FORCE_LOCAL_FAULT_OS

Field.Description: If set, and if the FAULT_SOURCE_FOR_TX = SW_CNFG_REG, REMOTE_FAULT ordered-sets are sent in the Tx direction.
Field.Name: FORCE_REMOTE_FAULT_OS

Field.Description: If set, and if the FAULT_SOURCE_FOR_TX = SW_CNFG_REG, LINK_INTERRUPTION ordered-sets are sent in the Tx direction.
Field.Name: FORCE_LINK_INTERRUPT_OS

Field.Description: Indicates the source from where the transmit fault responses are determined.
Field.Name: FAULT_SOURCE_FOR_TX

Field.Description: Controls which RSV event causes a purge event that triggers RXERR to be set for the packet sent by the MAC to the IP.
Field.Name: MASK

Field.Description: When set, forces the MAC to generate an XON indication to the MMU for all classes of service in the receive direction
Field.Name: FORCE_PFC_XON

Field.Description: When set, enables the generation of receive and transmit PFC events into the corresponding statistics vectors (RSV and TSV)
Field.Name: PFC_STATS_EN

Field.Description: When set, enables detection of PFC frames in the receive direction and generation of COSMAPs to MMU based on incoming timer values
Field.Name: RX_PFC_EN

Field.Description: When set, enables the transmission of PFC frames
Field.Name: TX_PFC_EN

Field.Description: When set, enables the transmission of pause frames whenever there is a transition on txbkp input to MAC from MMU
Field.Name: TX_PAUSE_EN

Field.Description: When set, enables detection of pause frames in the receive direction and pause/resume the transmit data path
Field.Name: RX_PAUSE_EN

Field.Description: Number of cell counts in CDMAC TX FIFO
Field.Name: CELL_CNT

Field.Description: Enable MIB statistics counters for the corresponding sub-port.
Field.Name: COUNT_ENABLE

Field.Description: Reset for CDMAC MIB statistics counters for the port. A low-to-high transition on this bit will trigger the counter-clear operation. The counters take a maximum of 128 MIB clock cycles to be cleared.
Field.Name: COUNT_CLEAR

Field.Description: The maximum packet size that is used in statistics counters updates.
Field.Name: COUNT_MAX_SIZE

Field.Description: Receive 64-byte frame counter.
Field.Name: R64

Field.Description: Receive 65 to 127 byte frame counter.
Field.Name: R127

Field.Description: Receive 128 to 255 byte frame counter.
Field.Name: R255

Field.Description: Receive 256 to 511 byte frame counter.
Field.Name: R511

Field.Description: Receive 512 to 1023 byte frame counter.
Field.Name: R1023

Field.Description: Receive 1024 to 1518 byte frame counter.
Field.Name: R1518

Field.Description: Receive 1519 to 1522 byte VLAN-tagged frame counter.
Field.Name: RMGV

Field.Description: Receive 1519 to 2047 byte frame counter.
Field.Name: R2047

Field.Description: Receive 2048 to 4095 byte frame counter.
Field.Name: R4095

Field.Description: Receive 4096 to 9216 byte frame counter.
Field.Name: R9216

Field.Description: Receive 9217 to 16383 byte frame counter.
Field.Name: R16383

Field.Description: Receive BC frame counter.
Field.Name: RBCA

Field.Description: Receive RPROG0 frame counter.
Field.Name: RPROG0

Field.Description: Receive RPROG1 frame counter.
Field.Name: RPROG1

Field.Description: Receive RPROG2 frame counter.
Field.Name: RPROG2

Field.Description: Receive RPROG3 frame counter.
Field.Name: RPROG3

Field.Description: Receive frame counter (all packets).
Field.Name: RPKT

Field.Description: Receive good frame.
Field.Name: RPOK

Field.Description: Receive UC frame counter.
Field.Name: RUCA

Field.Description: Receive promiscuous packet counter.
Field.Name: RPRM

Field.Description: Receive UC frame counter.
Field.Name: RMCA

Field.Description: Receive pause frame counter.
Field.Name: RXPF

Field.Description: Receive PFC(Per-Priority Pause) frame counter.
Field.Name: RXPP

Field.Description: Receive control frame counter.
Field.Name: RXCF

Field.Description: Receive FCS Error Frame Counter.
Field.Name: RFCS

Field.Description: Receive Code Error Frame Counter.
Field.Name: RERPKT

Field.Description: Receive Length Out of Range Frame Counter.
Field.Name: RFLR

Field.Description: Receive Jabber Frame Counter.
Field.Name: RJBR

Field.Description: Receive MTU Check Error Frame Counter.
Field.Name: RMTUE

Field.Description: Receive Oversized Frame Counter.
Field.Name: ROVR

Field.Description: Receive single and double VLAN tagged frame counter.
Field.Name: RVLN

Field.Description: Receive double VLAN tagged frame.
Field.Name: RDVLN

Field.Description: Receive unsupported opcode frame counter.
Field.Name: RXUO

Field.Description: Receive unsupported DA for pause/PFC frame counter.
Field.Name: RXUDA

Field.Description: Receive incorrect SA counter.
Field.Name: RXWSA

Field.Description: Receive Byte Counter.
Field.Name: RBYT

Field.Description: Receive undersized frame counter.
Field.Name: RUND

Field.Description: Receive fragment counter.
Field.Name: RFRG

Field.Description: Receive RUNT Frame Counter.
Field.Name: RRPKT

Field.Description: Receive Runt Byte Counter.
Field.Name: RRBYT

Field.Description: Receive PFC frame with enable bit set for Priority0.
Field.Name: RPFC0

Field.Description: Receive PFC frame transition XON to XOFF for Priority0.
Field.Name: RPFCOFF0

Field.Description: Receive PFC frame with enable bit set for Priority1.
Field.Name: RPFC1

Field.Description: Receive PFC frame transition XON to XOFF for Priority1.
Field.Name: RPFCOFF1

Field.Description: Receive PFC frame with enable bit set for Priority2.
Field.Name: RPFC2

Field.Description: Receive PFC frame transition XON to XOFF for Priority2.
Field.Name: RPFCOFF2

Field.Description: Receive PFC frame with enable bit set for Priority3.
Field.Name: RPFC3

Field.Description: Receive PFC frame transition XON to XOFF for Priority3.
Field.Name: RPFCOFF3

Field.Description: Receive PFC frame with enable bit set for Priority4.
Field.Name: RPFC4

Field.Description: Receive PFC frame transition XON to XOFF for Priority4.
Field.Name: RPFCOFF4

Field.Description: Receive PFC frame with enable bit set for Priority5.
Field.Name: RPFC5

Field.Description: Receive PFC frame transition XON to XOFF for Priority5.
Field.Name: RPFCOFF5

Field.Description: Receive PFC frame with enable bit set for Priority6.
Field.Name: RPFC6

Field.Description: Receive PFC frame transition XON to XOFF for Priority6.
Field.Name: RPFCOFF6

Field.Description: Receive PFC frame with enable bit set for Priority7.
Field.Name: RPFC7

Field.Description: Receive PFC frame transition XON to XOFF for Priority7.
Field.Name: RPFCOFF7

Field.Description: Transmit 64 Byte Frame Counter.
Field.Name: T64

Field.Description: Transmit 65 to 127 byte frame counter.
Field.Name: T127

Field.Description: Transmit 128 to 255 byte frame counter.
Field.Name: T255

Field.Description: Transmit 256 to 511 byte frame counter.
Field.Name: T511

Field.Description: Transmit 4096 to 9216 byte frame counter.

Field.Description: Transmit 9217 to 16383 byte frame counter.

Field.Description: Transmit Broadcast Frame Counter.
Field.Name: TBCA

Field.Description: Transmit PFC frame with enable bit set for Priority0.
Field.Name: TPFC0

Field.Name: TPFCOFF0

Field.Name: TPKT

Field.Description: Latched Local fault
Field.Name: LOCAL_FAULT_STATUS

Field.Name: REMOTE_FAULT_STATUS
